author: wschwab
content: can someone remind me how many honest validators there need to be in a particular epoch to prevent collusion? I saw someone say that it was 1/3, but I thought the number was lower now

author: m.kalinin
content:
Layer1 EVM will work under PoS consensus driven by the beacon chain with transactions included into a beacon block. Transactions will be executed by application-layer. In simple words application-layer is Ethereum Mainnet with beacon chain consensus and fork choice rule.
Look here for the beacon chain spec, https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/merge/beacon-chain.md#applicationpayload
And here for the high level description of potential design of the application-layer, https://hackmd.io/@n0ble/ethereum_consensus_upgrade_mainnet_perspective

author: m.kalinin
content: What do you mean by collusion? If adversary controls `>1/3` of stake it may cause liveness violation. You might want to look into security model for details, https://notes.ethereum.org/@vbuterin/rkhCgQteN?type=view#Security-models
